articles.content: 'When you're young and fans boo you maybe give them a little look back, but when you get a bit older you don't get into all that nonsense so much, so it was a really nice thing to have done for me.'To become record goalscorer for a club is undoubtedly a remar… [+2217 chars]

articles.title: Why did UFC try to silence journalists and fighters as it returned to action? - The Guardian
articles.description: Saturday night saw a major live sports event staged in America for the first time in weeks. But Dana White wanted some details kept quiet

articles.title: Atletico Madrid 'offer Thomas Partey to Liverpool in Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain swap deal' - Mirror Online
articles.description: Atletico Madrid and Liverpool could be involved in summer transfer action with the Spaniards keen to swap Thomas Partey for Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain
